Replace.Text: Everything is possible, except being the kingâ€™s ear!
Emphasis on teaching and revitalizing schools

City center +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] science (capital +3 [ICON_SCIENCE] science). Academies can only be built close to the city center, taking half the construction time. After construction is completed: If the population of city [ICON_CITIZEN] is greater than 2, the library will be donated immediately. If the population of the city [ICON_CITIZEN] is greater than 4, a university will be given as a gift immediately (the "Education" technology needs to be unlocked).
He likes players with high culture value and hates players with low culture value.

City center +2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture (capital +3 [ICON_CULTURE] culture). The library has +1 slot for great works of art, +1 slot for [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] great works, and the university has +1 slot for great works. Gain 2 [ICON_GreatArtist] and [ICON_GreatWriter] points from each college each turn. After a masterpiece is produced in the city, 50% of the construction progress of the wonders will be completed immediately, and all wonders will have +3 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value.

Instead of knight. No strategic resources required. Maintenance costs are lower. [ICON_Movement] Movement has been improved. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] After killing a unit, gain 15 experience points and restore [ICON_Movement] movement and attack times.

Unlocks the builder's ability to build the Hanlin Painting and Calligraphy Academy, a Song Dynasty-specific improvement facility. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Only one can be built per city, and cannot be built on hill tiles. [NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, +6 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity. Every time a masterpiece is produced in this city, it will get +1 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value and +2 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins. Great Works of Art and [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing provide +50% to the cultural value of [ICON_CULTURE]. After unlocking the "Education" technology, for every 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] population in this city, there will be +0.8 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value. After unlocking the "Flying" technology, [ICON_CULTURE] culture value can provide [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance.

Unlocks the builder's ability to build a Postal Station, an improved facility unique to the Song Dynasty. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Can only be built on cells with roads, can be built outside the empire (within the third ring road of the city), and cannot be adjacent to another post post. [NEWLINE]After construction, the cell where it is located and the surrounding cells will be included in the city (within the third ring of the city). +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity after first built. +1 [ICON_FOOD] food, +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, after unlocking "steam power" and "internal combustion engine" technology, additional +1 [ICON_FOOD] food, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, + 1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science value. Merchants will be given 40 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins (at standard speed) when passing the postal post, which will be doubled after unlocking the "Feudalism" and "Mercantilism" municipalities. Garrison gains [ICON_Strength] defense bonus.

Instead of knight. No strategic resources required. Maintenance costs are lower. [ICON_Movement] Movement has been improved. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] After killing a unit, gain 15 experience points and restore [ICON_Movement] movement and attack times.

Unlocks the builder's ability to build the Hanlin Painting and Calligraphy Academy, a Song Dynasty-specific improvement facility. Every time a masterpiece is produced in this city, it will get +1 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value and +2 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins. Great Works of Art and [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works of Writing provide +50% to the cultural value of [ICON_CULTURE]. After unlocking the "Education" technology, for every 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] population in this city, there will be +0.8 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value. After unlocking the "Flying" technology, [ICON_CULTURE] culture value can provide [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance.

Unlocks the builder's ability to build a Postal Station, an improved facility unique to the Song Dynasty. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Can only be built on cells with roads, can be built outside the empire (within the third ring road of the city), and cannot be adjacent to another post post. [NEWLINE]After construction, the cell where it is located and the surrounding cells will be included in the city (within the third ring of the city). +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity after first built. +1 [ICON_FOOD] food, +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, after unlocking "steam power" and "internal combustion engine" technology, additional +1 [ICON_FOOD] food, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, + 1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science value. Merchants will be given 40 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins (at standard speed) when passing the postal post, which will be doubled after unlocking the "Feudalism" and "Mercantilism" municipalities. Garrison gains [ICON_Strength] defense bonus.
We are pleased to welcome your trade mission. They will be treated with due honors.
Why do you come to see the Immortal Song Dynasty, the great country of art?
There is a city near us. Want to come and visit? Our artists create many great works.
I never thought this would happen...how could this happen.
Facts have proved that you are a respectable friend of Song Dynasty, and we accept your proposal.
You are not worthy of being my friend.
Please allow us to return the favor of your friendship.
If you want war, I will make it happen.
You are an evil seed. You must be destroyed.
You have seen a corner of our capital city. Is your capital half as magnificent as this?
Fortunately, you don't have the guts to try to compete with the Song Dynasty. Our culture is unparalleled.
When you see the art of the Song Dynasty, are you surprised by anything else?
Our trade mission should be arriving soon, bringing with them the best spices, teas and silks from the Song Dynasty. Enjoy!
Presumably your people are also immersed in elegant art.
How could the Song Dynasty endure such a barbaric land? !
Therefore, a small insect dared to offend the dragon. This is really stupid.
